name: European Social Insurance Platform AISBL
legal: association internationale sans but lucratif de droit belge
goal: Representing the interests of European national statutory social insurance organisations at EU level. Consulting with the EU institutions on all social policy, pension and health issues.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Youth
